content: मय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) An affix used to indicate ‘made of,’ ‘consisting or composed of,’ ‘full of’: कनकमय, काष्ठमय, तेजोमय, जलमय &c. --यः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a demon, the architect of the demons. (He built the ‘three cities’ for the demons; <ab>cf.</ab> त्रिपुर. He is also said to have built a splendid hall for the Pāṇḍavas). {@--2@} A horse. {@--3@} A camel. {@--4@} A mule. --यी A mare.
